body_content.explanation: in the sport of hurling (= an Irish team game similar to hockey), one of the three attacking players who play behind the players on their team closest to the goal of the other team, or this position in a team:
examples: He was brought into the side as right half forward for this game.
The coach has decided to play him at half forward rather than full forward.
They have one of the fastest and most combative half forward lines in the league.
